reviewtext: I purchase this item in Amazon. Which I purchase a lot of things in Amazon. This item arrive on time, it is so nice and convenient to have at home or if you are travelling to take it with you in order to charge all the things that we have now days that have to be charge.It is just like the description say. Easy to set up you can put on the wall if you like? Or on the floor. I am living for overseas and it is going to be very convenient item to have.Luz M Brown
